mapper.select: select kaptcode from apartment where dongname = #{dongname}
SELECT RENT_AREA FROM APT_RENT GROUP BY RENT_AREA,APARTCODE HAVING APARTCODE ='A13522007' ORDER BY RENT_AREA
SELECT a.* FROM( SELECT APT_RENT.RENT_DEPOSIT FROM APT_RENT WHERE RENT_AREA = #{area} AND APARTCODE ='A13522007' ORDER BY RENT_YEAR DESC, RENT_MONTH DESC )a where ROWNUM = 1
SELECT a.* FROM( SELECT APT_TRADE.TRADE_PRICE FROM APT_TRADE WHERE TRADE_AREA = #{area} AND APARTCODE ='A13522007' ORDER BY TRADE_YEAR DESC, TRADE_MONTH DESC )a where ROWNUM = 1
SELECT KAPTNAME FROM APARTMENT WHERE KAPTCODE = 'A13522007'

SELECT * FROM( select rent.RENT_AREA , max(rent."rent_max") "rent_max" , min(rent."rent_min") "rent_min" from( SELECT RENT_YEAR,RENT_MONTH, RENT_AREA,MAX(RENT_DEPOSIT) "rent_max" ,MIN(RENT_DEPOSIT) "rent_min"FROM APT_RENT GROUP BY APARTCODE , RENT_AREA ,RENT_MONTH ,RENT_YEAR HAVING APARTCODE ='A13522007' AND RENT_MONTH between TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(add_months(SYSDATE,-5),'MM'))AND TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(add_months(SYSDATE,0),'MM')) ORDER BY RENT_YEAR DESC ,RENT_MONTH DESC )rent group by rent.RENT_AREA order by rent.RENT_AREA ) rent FULL JOIN ( select trade.trade_area , max(trade."trade_max") "trade_max", max(trade."trade_min") "trade_min" from (SELECT TRADE_YEAR,TRADE_MONTH, TRADE_AREA,MAX(TRADE_PRICE) "trade_max" ,MIN(TRADE_PRICE) "trade_min"FROM APT_TRADE GROUP BY APARTCODE ,TRADE_MONTH ,TRADE_YEAR , TRADE_AREA HAVING APARTCODE ='A13522007' AND TRADE_MONTH between TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(add_months(SYSDATE,-5),'MM'))AND TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(add_months(SYSDATE,0),'MM')) ORDER BY TRADE_YEAR DESC ,TRADE_MONTH DESC)trade group by trade.trade_area ORDER BY trade.trade_area
)trade ON rent.rent_area = trade.trade_area

SELECT RENT_YEAR ,RENT_MONTH,APARTCODE ,RENT_AREA ,MAX(RENT_DEPOSIT) "rent_max",MIN(RENT_DEPOSIT) "rent_min" FROM APT_RENT GROUP BY RENT_YEAR,RENT_MONTH ,APARTCODE ,RENT_AREA HAVING APARTCODE ='A13522007' AND RENT_AREA = #{area} ORDER BY RENT_YEAR ,RENT_MONTH

SELECT TRADE_YEAR ,TRADE_MONTH ,MAX(TRADE_PRICE)"trade_max" , MIN(TRADE_PRICE) "trade_min" FROM APT_TRADE GROUP BY TRADE_YEAR,TRADE_MONTH,APARTCODE,TRADE_AREA HAVING APARTCODE ='A13522007' AND TRADE_AREA = #{area} ORDER BY TRADE_YEAR,TRADE_MONTH

select a.rent_year, a.rent_month,b.trade_year, b.trade_month, a."rent_max" , a."rent_min", b."trade_max", b."trade_min" from ( SELECT RENT_YEAR,RENT_MONTH, RENT_AREA,MAX(RENT_DEPOSIT) "rent_max" ,MIN(RENT_DEPOSIT) "rent_min"FROM APT_RENT GROUP BY APARTCODE ,RENT_MONTH ,RENT_YEAR , RENT_AREA HAVING APARTCODE ='A13522007' AND RENT_AREA = #{area} ORDER BY RENT_YEAR DESC ,RENT_MONTH DESC ) a FULL JOIN ( SELECT TRADE_YEAR,TRADE_MONTH, TRADE_AREA,MAX(TRADE_PRICE) "trade_max" ,MIN(TRADE_PRICE) "trade_min"FROM APT_TRADE GROUP BY APARTCODE ,TRADE_MONTH ,TRADE_YEAR , TRADE_AREA HAVING APARTCODE ='A13522007' AND TRADE_AREA = 34 ORDER BY TRADE_YEAR DESC ,TRADE_MONTH DESC )b ON a.RENT_MONTH = b.TRADE_MONTH
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM apt_rent WHERE (rent_year,rent_month)IN( SELECT A.rent_year, A.rent_month FROM( SELECT rent_year,rent_month FROM apt_rent GROUP BY rent_year, rent_month ORDER BY rent_year, rent_month)a WHERE ROWNUM = 1 )

DELETE FROM apt_trade WHERE (trade_year,trade_month)IN( SELECT A.trade_year, A.trade_month FROM( SELECT trade_year,trade_month FROM apt_trade GROUP BY trade_year,trade_month ORDER BY trade_year,trade_month)a WHERE ROWNUM = 1 )
